title: Practical Course on Digital Microcredential Assessment and Delivery

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Micro-credential design and evaluation methods focusing on social sector job competency enhancement for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design evaluation criteria using a digital badge system.
Learners can apply formative assessments in LMS-based micro-credential programs.
Learners can establish a digital credential delivery system optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
